WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Animate Dead
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: This spell creates an undead servant.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Bestow Curse
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of the spell.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Blink
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns for the duration of the spell.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Clairvoyance
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Counterspell
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Dispel Magic
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Fear
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Fireball
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Fly
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Gaseous Form
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Glyph of Warding
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, either upon a surface (such as a table or a section of floor or wall) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest) to conceal the glyph.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Haste
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Lightning Bolt
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Magic Circle
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Major Image
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Nondetection
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Phantom Steed
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: A Large quasi-real, horselike creature appears on the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Protection from Energy
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Remove Curse
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Sending
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Sleet Storm
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Slow
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Stinking Cloud
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Tiny Hut
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you and remains stationary for the duration.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Tongues
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Vampiric Touch
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds.

WizardLevel3Spells.Name: Water Breathing
WizardLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.
